document_data.mainbody:
avel was a farmer in Neverwinter and student at the Neverwinter Academy during the late 14 century DR.
When the city of Neverwinter put a call out for adventurers to investigate the deadly disease known as the Wailing Death in 1372 DR, Pavel and Bim forewent their life as farmers and joined the academy. When the academy was attacked that same year, Bim died in the initial assault and Pavel joined the Hero of Neverwinter for a brief time as they escaped from the depths of the academy into the city proper.
